subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Arroyo scored 6 of his 17 points in overtime as the Miami Heat overcame a 39-point effort by Kobe Bryant to beat the visiting Los Angeles Lakers, 114-111, on Thursday night.
snippet: Carlos Arroyo scored 6 of his 17 points in overtime as the Miami Heat overcame a 39-point effort by Kobe Bryant to beat the visiting Los Angeles Lakers, 114-111, on Thursday night.
